name: Holmes UPnP
body:
### Welcome to Holmes.

Holmes is a Java application that implements DLNA/UPnP protocol for playing videos, music, pictures and podcasts (RSS) to compatible devices.

Holmes runs on Windows and Linux with [VLC](http://www.videolan.org/vlc/) 2.x, Freebox V6 (a french set top box) and LG SmartTV devices

See [Holmes wiki](https://github.com/ccheneau/Holmes/wiki) for more information

### Download

Current Holmes version is 0.2.3
* [Download Windows installer] (https://github.com/downloads/ccheneau/Holmes/holmes-0.2.3-setup.exe)
* [Download Tar.gz] (https://github.com/downloads/ccheneau/Holmes/holmes-0.2.3.tar.gz)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
